website_summaries.verdict: One-handed drink spout on this water bottle makes it very easy and convenient.
pros: Spout pops up with the push of a button
Can be washed in the dishwasher
Includes fill lines so you can keep track of your water intake
Mouthpiece stays covered until you are ready to drink
Made from thick and durable materials
cons: This model is not as well insulated as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, they both leaked eventually.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved this bottle. I loved it so much I bought two of them. Now I've had both bottles for a few months and both of them leak. I hold them upside down, and water slowly trickles out. I've double checked that they are sealed and the spout is closed, and they both still leak. The water isn't coming through the spout, but something around the spout. Before they both started leaking I loved the built in carabiner. I loved the easy way to open it and the fact that it had a straw. Now I just hate them.
customer_reviews.author: Bela Vander Voort

customer_reviews.title: Leaks horribly
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY - this thing leaks like crazy from the top even when locked. I cannot throw this in my bag, as it will leak all over everything. I hate this new design and am sorry I threw out my old Contigo Addison. The spout ripped on that but at least it did not leak - ever. Video shows me locking the bottle then it leaking when turned upside down or sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and comfortable! But Drips a bit
customer_reviews.text: I have 2. Pros: I love the clip Amazing!! Just quickly unclip from your backpack and clip it back,so convenient for school or any time u have a backpack. The soft mouth peace is supper nice and feels good too. Drinks very comfy. Cons: after some time the seal is not the best. So if it's not standing up right it leaks. It's annoying but it drips very slowly so it's still very usable. Conclusion: the clip is so convenient I think it's worth the inconvenience of the dripping. Plus it's just comfortable to use because of the straw. Would not spend over $15, at $12 good, I wish it was $7 I would be very content.
customer_reviews.author: JPG

customer_reviews.title: Too much air in the straw.
customer_reviews.text: For well over a month, I've been getting more air than water through the straw. I've made sure that the straw has on tight and that it isn't damaged. I've also noticed the water flows better when the lid is loose, which isn't helpful when you're in the move. I've purchased four items from Contigo, and thus far, this the worst one. However, their one commonality is that the material is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Cholyn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I typically love contigos. This particular order has been terrible from the very beginning. When the lid is twisted completely and is sealed, it’s really difficult to drink from. You have to break the seal in order to chug water, and then remember to seal it back so it won’t leak. HOWEVER, the spout leaks water if the bottle is on its side. It’s a cant-win situation and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Not just a water bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is not just another water bottle. This is a Contigo Brand. Contigans are loyal, hard-working, trust-worthy, and multi-tasking beasts. If you’ve never had the pleasure of meeting a one, you’re missing out. My water-weilding Contigan is with me every day, cheering me on at the gym, dribble-proof access spout outstretched to remind me to stay hydrated. He even follows me to work, motivating me to focus, drink more water, work hard, drink even more water! Just by being there, I’m more productive, more successful! On target for a bright future! He’s my trainer, my coach, my new BFF! (But don’t tell my coffee-tumbling Contigan, who is also fabulous, or he might get jelly.)
customer_reviews.author: online shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I like to carry water when taking the dogs for a walk. This 24-oz water bottle carries enough for me + 2 Shih Tzus for an afternoon ramble (1-2 hrs) Easy for me to drink from, and the clip on the handle makes it easy to carry, attached to my backpack. I do have to unscrew the lid to pour some out for the dogs into their collapsible bowl, but that's fine. The handle is large enough to swing from my hand comfortably, and to hang their water dish on with a carabiner as well. Wide mouth makes cleaning easy, and plenty of room to put some standard sized ice cubes into the bottle, too.
customer_reviews.author: tinyNorman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It keeps stuff cold but not for super long periods of time at all .. it’s bulkier than expected & not easily cleaned by hand washing there are a lot of crevices in the lid to get & it’s time consuming & I still worry I got it all. Mine ‘holds onto’ flavors of stuff too like I can taste yesterday’s tea in today’s water even tho I washed it . May do better if washed in a dishwasher- if it’s dishwasher safe even I didn’t check(sorry) because I don’t have one .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle but builds up pressure and squirts water out
customer_reviews.text: The bottle itself is good but sometimes especially with a temperature change it seems to build up some pressure and shoot water out when I release the spout. Very annoying to get sprayed with water while driving or working at my desk. I dont want to over exaggerate, Ive had this bottle for many months now and still use it, I just try to leave the spout unlocked and use caution when opening. Other than this occasional issue the bottle has been great.
customer_reviews.author: James J Canepa

customer_reviews.title: This bottle leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Let me explain.. As far as drinkability and cleaning it’s fantastic but my bottle has continued to leak. Maybe mine is defective but I wouldn’t know until I tried another bottle. This bottle is my gym/work bottle and it continuously leaks in my gym bag which is very unappealing. When I’m Going to the gym I would like a bottle I can easily toss in my bag without any worry of leaking on my clothes and electronics. Please let me know if my bottle is defective or this is normal for this particular water bottle. Currently I would not recommend this bottle for the frequent gym goer or traveler due to the leakage you may experience.
customer_reviews.author: Cay Robertson

customer_reviews.title: suction sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping that I just have a defective product– I ordered a replacement and will update my review if this is in fact true. When using my bottle, it sucks up more air than water, sometimes no water at all. After a bunch of fiddling with the straw, unscrewing and rescrewing, it sometimes sucks up a decent amount of water but then goes back to sucking up tons of air. I’m very disappointed since I have had older versions of this water bottle and other contigo products that I love! Hopefully new product will be better :(
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Why Does It Feel Like a Sippy Cup?!
customer_reviews.text: My cup is beautiful. I love the color, passion fruit. It's very durable and I love that I can clip it, the handle onto my clothes when I am not using it. The only thing that I do not like is the drink dispenser (it's WIDE). It should not feel like I'm drinking from a sippy cup. It loooks and feels incredibly weird drinking from it. I purchased this to be able to sip from my water bottle without messing up my lipstick. Well, this isn't helping. I love the brand the quality is awesome but the design of the straw is a bit senseless to me.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Beware- they won't honor the lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.text: I previously gave these water bottles 5 stars. I liked them so much, I ordered 4 of these because they are 32oz. My husband knocked his over in our yoga class and the lid broke. The bottles have a lifetime guarentee. I contacted the company. I sent them the receipt and broken lid. I have waited 4 weeks for a response, and the response was ridiculous! I was asked to send in more pictures. And also asked how often I wash it, and what do I put in it.... Water, water is the only thing I put in it, and I hand wash them once a week. Beware, if there is a problem, they will not honor the lifetime warrenty!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: I freaking love this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this water bottle. I'm so much more hydrated now because I always have this thing with me. I like that the spout flips down and gets covered by another plastic piece - it makes me feel like it won't get as dirty/lint covered in my big work bag. I also like the lock feature when the spout is down because I can just throw it in my bag and not worry. I haven't had any leaks yet. Makes commuting easy. It's also a good size for my relatively small hands to hold without being so skinny it doesn't fit well in car cupholders.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lane

customer_reviews.title: Better than Camelbak
customer_reviews.text: Great for people like me who always spill their drinks! Love the color, love the lock feature, love the latch feature on the handle so you can hang it on your belt loop or what have you. Also much easier to clean than the camelbak bottle; Just twist straw and it pops right off, no tugging and pulling like many others. Only reason I give a four star is because it does “sweat” Annoying but pretty common with bottles. Just add a cozie and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Hard to suck but otherwise wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for work! One slight issue with it: the straw in mine sits solidly against the bottom, meaning the suction needed to get water into your face is intense. I have to unscrew the top just a smidge for effertless suck (for lack of a better term). A coworker has one that is the 24 oz version (whichever is one size smaller than the 32oz I have) and doesn't have this issue. Someone suggested I cut a bit of the bottom of the straw off, but it's a very hard plastic, so.....
customer_reviews.author: AKaye

customer_reviews.title: This one is the "Lexus" of Contigo water bottles.
customer_reviews.text: My whole family has been using the regular contigo bottles for a few years, and really like them. Then I bought THIS ONE, which I didn't notice was slightly different, and I LOVE IT. It is like the "Lexus" of Contigo bottles. The bottle is so smooth and contoured to your hand, the spout is flatter and feels more comfy in your mouth, and it has a lock function, so the spout won't open if you accidentally hit the button on it (or if you have a 1 yr old who tries to open your bottle!) No leaking. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LizzT

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a day and a half but I love it already
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a day and a half but I love it already! It's not perfect, but for the price, it's great. I switched from a CamelBak and I like this better. The form of the bottle makes it easy to grip and I love the markings on the side. The autospout is great as well, however it sprays you unless you open it a certain way. I had to cut the straw a little bit so that I wouldn't have to sip really forcefully each time I took a drink. It is leakproof so far and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Huge Mold Collector
customer_reviews.text: It is VERY HARD to clean and is a huge mold collector. I normally wash my water bottles weekly and rinse out nightly, but within the first month, it started collecting mold everywhere. It was on the bottom, around the straw stem, on the sucker and on the bottom of the sucker. I've tried everything to clean it. It is not wide enough to stick my hand on the bottom to wipe it. I've tried soaking every piece in vinegar and nothings worked. I had to throw it away after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Meka

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BOTTLE!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't say this but I have absolutely no complaints about this bottle. It's sleek and beautiful to carry around so I am always staying hydrated. I've been using it for months and so far, not one leak. I love the straw so that I don't have to tip the bottle to drink. It is also super fast and easy to clean. GET IT! I got it in purple and it's gorgeous (but purple is also my favorite color, so that's a biased response).
customer_reviews.author: Kerfuffles

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight bottle with straw. My winner!
customer_reviews.text: I am an extremely picky person when it comes to pens and water bottles. I have been searching for about 4 years now for the perfect water bottle, and I am happy to say that I finally found the winner. This is lightweight, has a straw, easy to clean and does not have a smell to it. Once a bottle gets a smell in it, I buy a new one, I am not able to get past the smell. Will be buying more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Contigo does it again
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been wanting one of these for a long time. Leak proof. No issues. There is even a slide lock to prevent the lid from accidentally opening. She loves the straw kind of water containers, so this was the prime choice for her. I got an Autoseal Cortland for myself.. Contigo has always been an enjoyable brand and I recommend their products! UPDATE: My wife has told me that THIS is the best product I've EVER bought for her. In 3 years of marriage, it all came down to a Contigo water bottle. I guess you can spoil your sweetheart for under $10.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected super soaker!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 2 stars because of what I think is a design flaw. When you put cold liquids into the bottle, and they sit for some time they warm up. When that happens it builds pressure in the bottle. If you have the straw attached, and open the mouthpiece the pressure that's inside pushes the liquid out of the mouthpiece like a firehose. So every time you go to take a drink, if you are holding the bottle in the orientation that you would drink from it, you get sprayed in the face.
customer_reviews.author: Disavowed1979

customer_reviews.title: Alright so far
customer_reviews.text: So far this has worked as expected. There have been two items that were unexpected. The spout will flip a bit of water in your face when it's launched from the stored position. I've taken to launching it so that the inevitable spray is parallel to my body. The second is that the little valve that lets air in is a bit stiff. This means that when you get down to the last quarter it wont open unless you are taking a particular large sip so it'll try to suck your tongue down the spout. Upside is that it is unlikely to leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: The bottle has a great color. I love that it has the pop up straw and locking mechanism. It never leaks. However, it also doesn't allow me to drink. The vent seal on the top is poorly designed. While yes, the bottle doesn't leak, the pressure builds when I take a sip to the point nothing comes out. There should be something to press it down and release the seal when the straw is open. Instead, I end up unscrewing the lid to release the pressure and allow the straw to actually function every time I want more than a mouthful of water. So annoying, especially if you're on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Exploding water
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a plane, but decided to try it out first. Filled it with water, opened the spout to sip and water exploded from the spout. Got completely soaked. Glad I didn't take it on a plane (I was going to fill from a water fountain inside the boarding are) and pretty sure my seat mates would not have appreciated the spontaneous bath. This was not a good buy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Not A Fake Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mother of young kids!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in perfect condition. It's exactly what I've been looking for. A large water container to carry with me around the house. Breastfeeding 2 babies, I need to stay hydrated. But also, having grabbing babies it's constantly being knocked over or they're trying to drink out of my bottle. This bottle is awesome because it doesn't spill and I can easily lock it when I'm done taking a swig so the baby can't drink water (too young to drink water). I'm going to recommend this bottle to all new mothers I know. Highly recommend this bottle!
customer_reviews.author: McTavey

customer_reviews.title: Lost quality after a month but it was a simple fix!
customer_reviews.text: My biggest qualm with this product is that the suction needed is a tad high - My gums were somewhat swollen for the first week after getting this. Anyway, about a month in I was sucking more air than liquid. Fortunately someone has posted a similar complaint and it turns out it's simple that the straw starts to become loose after a while. Simply twist it back into place and it's as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Kent Rollins

customer_reviews.title: THE NOISE, GRRRR
customer_reviews.text: First, beautiful functional bottle! But the noise is so aggravating it was discouraging me from drinking. I removed the vent plastic piece and it now works WONDERFUL for drinking. I can easily throw back 16 oz increasing my daily water intake. HOWEVER, with taking out the vent, I mindlessly tossed it and my bottle now leaks. Like ruined my pack lunch because I put it in the bag. Had to use a sink to pour the water out. If I find a plug I can take in and out I'll give this a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle, but....
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is this - if you leave the bottle in the car during the day, as the water heats up inside, it starts to leak out. At first I was confused why I had a puddle of water in my car’s cup holder, then I opened the bottle and it squirted out a stream of water. Luckily it was simply water and not anything sticky. From now on if I leave the bottle in the car, I need to remember to sligjtly unscrew the top, to let hot air escape and not push the water up the straw.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Panchenko

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these and the water bottles are great. Pros - excellent clip that holds strong, flip top that stays shut with a lock, a straw that actually works. Cons - rare occassions it has leaked a bit if the lid isn't seated properly, because of the straw and nozzle, you should use a tube brush to help clean (I put mine in the dishwasher and it works great).
customer_reviews.author: Ian K.

customer_reviews.title: I use this water bottle every single day and love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle!! The color (Chard) is lovely and the size is just right for me. It's easy to drink from and doesn't leak. I throw this in my commuting bag every morning and haven't had it leak even once. I've had this going on at least a month now. Highly recommend. The only complaint is that it sweats a lot, but duh, because this isn't double walled. An easy solution is to buy a koozie for it. I personally really enjoy this one:
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sucking on the spout is a little odd
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water bottle. There are a couple of pieces to it, but easy to clean. I like the clip action of the handle. I can hold the handle with 2 fingers (I have big hands and fingers, so kind of a big deal for me). Slips easily in and out of a pouch on my gym bag. No drips down the front of my shirt. To me its just a little weird to suck on the mouth piece. Not enough to get something else. Get it you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Best. Bottle. Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is, hands down, the best water bottle I've ever owned. Most bottles fall apart over tume, losing their deal and leaking. This one is durable, tightly sealed and convienent. The lock and the clasp are great features. I can't say enough good things. The only down sides are the noise it makes while sipping and the fact that it doesn't fit in a standard drink holder. That being said, my cup holders are bigger than normal and I am not bothered by the noise. Love this bottle! I got 3 more to give as Xmas gifts
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Have only used it once.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative to the wide mouth 32 oz Nalgene bottles. This one seemed perfect because it was thin enough to fit in cup holders and back packs and came with a drinking straw. But the straw has a rubber mouthpiece that I don’t really like and I’m concerned it will be harder to clean than. My old ones. I will use this when I need the smaller bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Doxsee

customer_reviews.title: Love this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Perfect water bottle for my tween. It lightweight enough she can hold onto it well and easy enough to keep clean. We used to only use contigo until she wanted a thermoflask. It was great for a while until the novelty wore off and it was too heavy when full for her to hold. So back to trusty Contigo! It’s sturdy enough to take a beating and dishwasher safe which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwocuties

customer_reviews.title: Best design features in a water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love the handle that's large enough to grip with all fingers and the spout with a cover that makes it more hygienic than many other brands. No issues with spilling so far when it's tipped on it's side. The straw construction and attachment is easy and secure. A cinch to wash. A friend had several of these bottles and raved about them for all the above reasons. I have purchased another one already!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Mrose

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT but this cheap knock off!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not maintain suction on the straw for easy sipping. When finished the water goes down the straw with a big clap. Cant quietly drink from it. Also ordered a replacement instead of refund, now wanting refund. That did not work from this sight either. Have had good luck with this brand of bottle but not this vendor. There's a reason it is $3 less. DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Works great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my honeymoon and love them. My husband and I used them our entire 2 week vacation in Hawaii, and found them perfect for day trips we took around the island. They were also nice to have at the hotel and fill up with ice/water before leaving for the day, or to just have water available on the nightstand. Plus, it's better for the environment to use a reusable water bottle versus vending machine disposable ones. Cheaper too.
customer_reviews.author: hme013

customer_reviews.title: Good but can be enhanced
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but had to take two stars because it has an issue with the way it takes air in to guarantee liquid flow so I found myself always having to open to get air in , also the straw gets loose too oftenly and drinks that are fizzy will cause it to squirt liquid out , on the other side it's easier to drink from and clean than the other bottles I had.
customer_reviews.author: DerekE

customer_reviews.title: Love the pop up spout!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water bottle because I like to carry water everywhere I go. The problem I had with my last water bottle was it was too big to fit in my car’s cup holders. I didn’t realize how much the easy pop up spout would come in handy when you are working out. I like to exercise on a stationary bike and do spin classes so the pop up spout makes it easy to grab a quick sip and get back into it! I also like the fact it is dishwasher safe - a lot of the ones I’ve had before weren’t. If you’re in the market for a water bottle, I highly recommended this one!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: ... had them a few days but so far I like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them a few days but so far I like them a lot. The pop up spout is attached to a straw and very convenient to use. I had to laugh about the comments on here concerning the funny noise it made when drinking from it. The first time I went to drink from it I turned up the bottle (not realizing there was a straw involved) and it did make a sound like a gobbling turkey. I laughed out loud but then figured out it wasn't a sippy cup and all was great. It's still fun to make the sound though. :)
customer_reviews.author: orickoh

customer_reviews.title: Great but.......
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle, easy to clean, great size but..... It can be difficult to get a full draw while drinking. I find that small sips are the way to go. If I try to take a big drink all at once, it's too difficult. I think it's designed this way as a way to ensure that it's leak proof which I find that it is. Other than having to take small sips, this bottle is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to sip, sturdy material, face full of water
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to get any water out of it when I take a sip. I have to loosen the lid which is not feasible if I'm in the car so I have to suck really really hard. It seems to be made of good material but the design needs a little work. I'd rather have a slightly leaky bottle I can actually drink from than this sippy cup-type lid. Also, when you click the button 9/10 times you get a face full of water if you don't slow the release with your finger.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Not good on a plane
customer_reviews.text: This bottle doesn’t do well under pressure 🤣my husband and I both own one of these and have had to apologize to death to fellow plane passengers after opening this bottle to drink and it spraying water over everyone around. We almost offered to pay their rent when they had to stay wet for the duration of a transatlantic flight... oops. For any other activities, they’re fine.
customer_reviews.author: Larita111

customer_reviews.title: Great for school!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my second grader who needed a big water bottle to take to school this year. He likes to turn it up while drinking so that the air escaping makes a “turkey” sound.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherWife

customer_reviews.title: Leaks with regular use.
customer_reviews.text: So, I ordered 4 of these at the same time, as I like to wash bottles regularly. I went with the Contigo brand as I love their coffee cups. These have left a lot to be desired. After 3 months of regular use, every one leaks. Sometimes from the threads where the lid screws on, and sometimes from the spout itself (yes, when closed). I gave 2 stars as I love the design. When using public transportation to commute to Philly everyday, the spout cover is a nice comfort piece. But the fact that all 4 leak regularly, I'll be ordering a different manufacturer now. To only get 3 months for the price is not worth a repeat purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Used this bottle for almost 6 months. I was doubtful while placing an order after reading the reviews. I’m so happy for ordering it. I bought it for my wife. The bottle is not leaking nor hissing. Its easy to use and since my wife is pregnant its helpful for her to track her water intake 8-10 glasses of 8ozs water(around 3+ bottles of water). Its not microwave or freezer safe. Its dishwasher safe, washed it pretty many times.
customer_reviews.author: Shreya Bukka

customer_reviews.title: It's great except . . .
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it feels in my hand, is sturdy and made of glass to eliminate any bad taste, it is leak proof and the Carabiner hook makes it easy to hold on to. But like many others complain, when I push the button to open, water sprays out of the mouth piece. Fortunately it's only been water so far. Perhaps the remedy is to put a small baffle inside the mouthpiece so the spray doesn't come straight out but still will easily exit the mouthpiece. That would be a minor modification by the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Not Functional
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is lovely in design but doesn’t function very well. First, it does sound exactly like a wild turkey when you drink from it. I purchased two, they both sound the same! Second, I found it difficult to get water out if it, no matter the angle. Sorry, although it’s leak proof and beautiful it doesn’t work for me!
customer_reviews.author: schoolgirl

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality bottles
customer_reviews.text: Okay this brand with this type of bottle? INCREDIBLE!! Sturdy, convenient, aesthetically pleasing. Nice little things like being able to hook them onto things and the quality of the straw. Also love how the straw is the same color as the bottle so it’s hard to get them mixed up with other bottles. The one tiny thing that bothers me is that when you open it, water will flick out towards your face. It’s just a few tiny drops so it isn’t a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Alexatthefarm

customer_reviews.title: Does not handle sparkling water
customer_reviews.text: Love the the bottle and the way the spout works. However, if you drink sparkling water, it will spray all over you when you release the spout and then continue to spirt out of the spout continuously. In my case, I really do not require it to be leak proof if knocked over. So, I removed the black flap which covers the vent inside the top. This solved the problem for me. As a result, for my use it is 5 stars, but I have rated it 3 stars if you want to use it for sparkling water and still be leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: raysaun

customer_reviews.title: Contigo keeps improving!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle for my husband because he wanted one just like mine. We buy new bottles like this probably every year and have tried many different brands. This was the closest to my last year's model so I purchased it. When I went to clean it, I checked it out more in detail. There are quite a few important upgrades contigo has made in this product: straw locks in so it won't fall off if it gets jostled or dropped and has a spout lock to keep the spout from popping open when the button rubs against something (which is the case in my son's backpack).
customer_reviews.author: Clavellina

customer_reviews.title: A convenient water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Mother's Day gift. My wife liked our daughter's water bottle and this turns out to be the upgraded version of our daughter's bottle. You can easily clip it on a belt loop with the handle clip. It has a foldable straw and a push button to access the straw. It also locks so you don't accidentally open the bottle. We have a number of Contigo products and they are very high quality. It is easy to disassemble and wash and very durable. My wife loves the convenience, quality, and style of her water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Julien

customer_reviews.title: Handy, but watch out for soaking streams
customer_reviews.text: The water bottle is a great size and shape with a handy clip to attach to belt or bag. Unfortunately, I have twice been soaked by a stream of water upon opening. Once, I'd flown with a half-full bottle, so I blamed the spray on that. The second time, the spray wasn't as spectacular, but I still got wet. I've found that angling the bottle away from me prior to opening seems to help. I suppose I could unscrew the cap, but that defeats the purpose of one-handed access.
customer_reviews.author: TeriG

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Love this water bottle!! Only issue.. sometime it gets a little pressure inside and will shoot all over you when you flick the straw up? Always a funny moment atleast! Still by far the best water bottle. Great quality as well. A little too big for the cup holder but I’m not complaining because I’m drinking more water then usual! Tip: buy straw cleaners with your water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it's like a fountain
customer_reviews.text: Be aware when you use this as a shaker bottle for drink powders. When you press the button to open the drink spout the pressure built up from shaking the bottle causes the liquid to spray out. I learned to unscrew the top to alleviate pressure after spending a few hours with a shirt decorated with peach tea.
customer_reviews.author: S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Works great for its purpose however...
customer_reviews.text: The container is perfect for carrying and drinking from. Great bottle to keep firm in your hand and the handle is convenient. Love the oz and ml info on the side. However... the flip up spout is cool and everything, it doesn't do much about keeping dirt out from where it is sealed. ALSO, the most annoying part is that when I press the release button the spout shoots up flicking the water in my face. I have to divert the bottle away from me in order not to be splashed. Definitely worth it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great design! Not completely leak proof.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received it, there was a small leak from the bottom of the bottle. I was able to easily fix that with some super glue so no problem there. I LOVE the design of it, its exactly what I wanted. Very easy to drink out of and take apart to clean. The straw reaches to the bottom so it gets all the water. However, i have taken it on several trips and its always leaked in my bag if left on its side. I don't normally leave it on its side so its not that bad but its definitely not completely leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: Xrystina Bicoy

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying this for life! Love this company!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this water bottle!!! I bought the previous design and the straw eventually started making noises. I looked for a replacement and noticed the design upgrade. The straw now screws in which is fantastic to keep it snug! There's a clip now on the loop to hold it, the top is a little tapered now and there's a lock for the lid. I've never been so happy with a water bottle before, thank you! Their stainless steal travel mugs are amazing as well! My coffee is hot for hours and hours.
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is great. I actually had a gray one already that I got from Target, I think, but my boyfriend kept stealing it so I decided to order another one and just let him have that one. It saved us from fighting over it! I really like the measurements on the side as it encourages me to drink more throughout the day. The pop-up feature for the mouthpiece is really nice since I feel like I can throw it in the car and even if it rolls around, the part you put your mouth on will stay clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fendall

customer_reviews.title: Contigo thinks of everything
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to increase my water intake while breastfeeding, because I find that I drink more if I have a straw. Love this thing. It really has every feature I could need - a spout that stays sanitary in my diaper bag because it’s able to be closed (but opened with one hand), a lock, and is super easy to clean. I’ve dropped it more times than I can count and it still doesn’t leak or have any adverse affects. Contigo thinks of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: If you put cold water in on a hot day and don’t take a sip for a while, pressure builds up in the bottle. When you try to take a sip, water squirts out in whatever direction the straw is pointing. Generally this meant right in my lap causing it to look like something truly unfortunate had happened. So no, it doesn’t leak, except for that. If you can have a sense of humor about it, it’s not so bad! Otherwise, it’s a great bottle! I took it to Disney. The clip ensured I could carry it hands-free which was a huge perk. It held plenty of water to keep me hydrated throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Idk what happened?! It was so quiet...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this water bottle! But now the straw's spout is making a loud noise every time I drink. I've only had it 5 weeks - it didn't do this before. I don't know how to contact the manufacturer through Amazon (one week past my return date). This is going to be so embarrassing when I'm in my business meetings. Hopefully this will get resolved soon and I can update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Started leaking after a few months
customer_reviews.text: In theory, I love this water bottle for its ease of use with one hand and it’s spill proof technology. However, after a few months, the water bottle started leaking so I could no longer place it in a bag or even have it anywhere but standing straight upright or everything would get wet.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Best quality
customer_reviews.text: I stopped buying these type of Contigo bottles because my kids used to chew threw the straws. I tried few other cheaper water bottles but they all either stopped working or broke. Thankfully they're a little older and I gave it another try and so far so good. The quality and sturdiness of the water bottles is incomparable.
customer_reviews.author: SMP

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly or disabled.
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother has trouble drinking water because of multiple strokes and as a result she is chronically dehydrated. I got her a standard 32oz nalgene and it was too heavy and unwieldy. This bottle is perfect. She drinks at least a full one a day and it's light and easy enough where she can refill it herself.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Sucks (no pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: What’s with this bottle?? Every time you unlock to take a sip, the spout literally jumps out and spills water on you....like it is trying to throw up. I thought it may be backflow and kept the spout open when filling to equalize internal pressure. Still doing the same Poor design maybe Need to fix it. Thankfully it’s only $10 No pun intended
customer_reviews.author: Murli Sanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one hand drinking!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of these bottles I ordered as a back up in case my first breaks! I LOVE them! The size is perfect as I drink a ton of water a day, the spout is gray to have as a nursing mom, I don't always have 2 hands to open the lid of a bottle, so the button flip spout is perfect. I do notice it'll leak a little if the bottle is full and gets tipped over. If it's at least a quarter empty it won't leak though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Good, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Overall good water bottle. Great size for getting your daily hydration. The straw takes a few tries to understand how to make a full seal, but it is possible. Also, the bottle is dishwasher safe, but I find it gets cloudy pretty quickly, not really sure why. I don’t recommend this for much more than water and flavored water.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I love contigo. I have a large one and my so. Was using the 14oz so I decided to get this for him and after a short while it leaks from the button you push to pop up the spout. I ordered another because it’s the best so far for us to drink water while out and about. Hopefully the next one doesn’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight for backpacking or hikes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bottle for your beverages, I only have used it with water for day hikes and it does not leak and is well constructed. It can hang off your belt or backpack and is easy to drink from the design of the bottle. It appears it will hold up for a long time and many hikes and camping or fishing trips. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wojnowski

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this bottle has a straw. I love the one handed button to open the spout. I like the measurements on the outside of the bottle in both oz and ml's. Easily fits ice cubes. The lock is very nice also.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: I had a habit of placing my wide mouth water bottle in my backpack without the lid fully screwed on. This water bottle makes that much harder to do! I haven't had it leak yet (used for about 2 weeks so far). Easy to drink from and refill. The only potential downside is that the straw and lid mechanism are a bit harder to clean - for that reason I only use it for water (no flavored drinks) - I think that is the case with any straw water bottle lid though, so not a detractor.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Accessible to drink from.
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this color because I didn't want the measurements on the side of the bottle and according to the Amazon pictures this color didn't have them which is why I'm giving 4 stars. Besides that I love the accessibility of drinking from this water bottle with one hand and while running at the gym. It is a little difficult to clean because of the rubber on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: maddie wesemann

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle. Love the contigo brand have bought many water bottles from the. Have used for many months and years and have washed in the dishwasher frequently and has held up very well. Definitely saves me from using and wasting any glasses and gets me to drink my daily water.
customer_reviews.author: Dani McKie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: My ONLY complaint is sometimes something happens with the straw where the air isn't coming through right and the suction is really hard. Other than that, these bottles are great quality and I love that the mouthpiece stays hidden and you can lock it shut for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Warren

customer_reviews.title: This water bottle is the love of my life.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had to buy three because I keep losing them or getting them stolen. I had my first one for five years - it's a 40 ounce but same brand and style - after many music festivals, camping and hiking adventures and at least two boyfriends it's still going. I love these because I drink more water when I have it, it comes with me everywhere and I'm sure it's ashamed of the things it's seen. 10/10 water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Elizabeth Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Really okay water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a travel back up to my 32 oz. wide mouth Nalgene. I wanted a straw and a clip, this has both. The plastic feels cheaper compared to the Nalgene, just not very thick I guess and I find the straw to be awkward, would prefer a more narrow, traditional straw, but I like that it not only closes up, it locks, and again, the clip. This will be perfectly fine for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this bottle—mostly.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size, easy to carry, fit's in the door of my fridge. However, after the first sip, when I flip the top open, the thing spits at me! It's a good thing I am just drinking water, because sometimes it is quite a bit and gets all over my clothes. I am sure it has something to do with a vacuum effect created in the straw, but I wish I could figure out how to have it stop this silly behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Contigo, please bring back the Autoseal Design
customer_reviews.text: Lost my Autoseal Contigo in Grey (Loved it!). They stopped producing it and came out with the Autospout. I thought, "Let's give this thing a try". UGHHHH. The spout gets dirty right away. You don't drink with gravity, you SUCK it out. It occasionally spits water at you if pressure resides in it. You can only put flat water in it. I used to be able to put carbonated water in the Autoseal. Please don't try that with the Autospout or else you've made a squirt gun. Contigo, it's great to come up with varying ideas, but why did you stop producing the Autoseal? It was the best water bottle out there.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Parker

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it but lid not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: My son liked this water bottle so much that I ended up getting him two. He likes the size, color, and how the spout and lid works. I, however, am not pleased with the durability of the lid. He dropped the bottle and now the spout on the lid won't close. I would not have thought just a normal drop on the kitchen floor would break the lid...therefore the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LoriK

customer_reviews.title: Loses suction for water flow
customer_reviews.text: Not sure happens to these,, my 2nd one to lose suction when you try to take a drink. As if a hole somewhere or the straw comes loose? I have taken both apart and spent quite the while trying to figure out why it malfunctions. Neither have been in a dish washer,, both hand washed only. Too late to return or ask for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the size and shape of this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and shape of this water bottle. I also really like how seemingly easy it is to clean - with a pipe cleaner. I had read a review about how you get a lot of air in each sip of water. I thought that wouldn't matter but it does. I'm a little bummed about that.
customer_reviews.author: Rholm

customer_reviews.title: Like the straw for drinking
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mother who wanted water by her bed at night. The internal straw makes it easy to drink from without tilting the entire bottle. We also own several like these and they're great for travel as the mouthpiece tucks away to prevent leakage.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Attractive wide mouth sip style water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Gifted water bottle - clear light grey base with solid grey top. Soft rubber sip style mouth piece with straw for upright drinking. Larger sized opening on top to allow for easy addition of ice cubes & cleaning with handled sponge. Felt heavy duty, could not flex bottle with application of moderate pressure. Unsure if dishwasher safe?
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Who thought you could screw up a water bottle
customer_reviews.text: The liquid climbs up the straw and spills out. If i put carbonated water in the bottle just the force of setting it on the table sends liquid shooting out of the mouth piece. I also have to take apart the straw often as I noticed mold will grow if its not cleaned. I decided to throw the bottle away and buy a better quality bottle that wont leak
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: My second one is leaking
customer_reviews.text: I'm pregnant and used one of these in my first pregnancy and thought it was an essential- for all in the middle of the night needs, breastfeeding etc and i even took it to the hospital with me. But I'm disappointed this one, I just opened it up recently and won't stop leaking, at first I thought it was me but there is something wrong with it. Can someone at @Contigo please reach out to me? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: LJG

customer_reviews.title: I've bought 3 of these and they've all been faulty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these just before a 10 day hiking trip and they both came faulty. The straw of the first doesn't fit properly and so it draws up little water and much air. The second bottle I bought has a faulty lock which is alright (until it opens and leaks water all over my bag). This is in fact the third and last of these bottles I buy. The very first also had a fault out of the box--it leaked. Really, I'm at fault. I should have stuck with my reliable Camelbak.
customer_reviews.author: Ali El Alfy

customer_reviews.title: Good for 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I used this bottle regularly for 5 months, taking it to workouts and other activities. It did fine for holding ice water. Pretty basic. Then the handle just broke—the plastic snapped, so now I can’t attach it to my lunch bag, or whatever other bag. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Reed R.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite spout.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar style at our grocery store but also wanted a bigger one. This spout snaps open when you click the button and spits water or whatever liquid you drink at you every time. It also is slightly awkward to close compared to my cheap $4.99 one I got at the grocery store. What I love about it is the straw instead of tip and drink. Way better for driving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love contigo water bottles BUT....
customer_reviews.text: I typically love contigo but of the two bottles I purchased one came with scuffs, dings and scratches in multiple places. It also didn’t have a plastic sleeve or wrapper over the entire thing and mouth piece like the other did and was very dusty. I don’t think any of this will effect using it, just a less than satisfied condition.
customer_reviews.author: rihg92

customer_reviews.title: Great for office jobs
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for working at the office. I prefer to drink out of a straw. I like how the straw flips in and out. Easy to drink water out of this. I wish it kinda makes alot of noise while drinking. I didn't want a metal container for work. It fits into cup holder easily. Becareful pressure builds up if its sitting in the car. Water will shoot out at ya .
customer_reviews.author: Kwame Doss

customer_reviews.title: 😓 I don’t need a bath right now
customer_reviews.text: When having the straw in place, I get sprayed in the face with water, or water bubble over whenever I open the spout. I’m not talking a little water either. It makes a huge mess. So disappointed ☹️ Also, wish it were double walled to keep it cooler and no condensation
customer_reviews.author: K. Barcello

customer_reviews.title: Inner straw needs tightening making this useless.
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept but poor design. I like the different measurements on the side of the bottle. I like that it’s easy to clean and doesn’t leak. However the inner straw needs to be screwed into place and it becomes loose after a few minutes so when you sip water you get air bubbles and very little water. Very annoying and a hassle to return so I’ll use it until I replace it ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: bought as gift... now going to gift myself
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my bf and I keep stealing it from him. It is durable the mouthpiece stays clean with the flip action. I have a glass one at work but now I need a daily for myself :) WORTH it after water bottle shopping for some time
customer_reviews.author: Brebot

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice, sturdy bottle over all
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice, sturdy bottle over all. My two biggest complaints is that, one the 32 oz size does not fit into the standard-sized cup holders of any of my cars. Second, you have to twist the straw very hard, or else you’ll be sucking in air along with water. While sucking in air is normal with a loose straw, the construction of the straw is such that it’s hard to get a good enough grip on it to tighten it enough. I kept the bottle because it’s pretty nice aside from those two issues. I would go for a smaller one if fitting them inside your car’s cup holder is important.
customer_reviews.author: Boot-satisfied

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle! The bottom is very wide, so it would not fit in a car cup holder. But the bottle is well made, the lid screws on easily yet still tight, in the spout is actually very comfortable. I don't know how to explain it, but if feels better drinking out of this bottle than my other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle! True to picture would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I take this bottle with me everywhere! Like. Everywhere. It had survived a lot and I love it. It's true to color, the lock works great, and like I said, it's survived a lot. It's actually the second time I bought it because I liked the first one so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy S

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely lovely Bottle
customer_reviews.text: As a guy... Wondering if its OK to say I'm in love... But I absolutely love this bottle. The size (helps to gauge my daily water intake)... The spout.... (pops in and out as at when needed)... The leak proof qualities are one of the things I love the most. I would buy this over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Barfade

product_meta.title: Contigo Autospout Ashland Water Bottle, 24oz , Monaco
product_meta.description: Color:Monaco| Size:24 oz.Stay hydrated with the Contigo Autospout Straw Ashland Water Bottle. This BPA free water bottle features a pop up straw for easy one handed drinking so you don’t have to take your eyes off the task at hand. Push the spout down to close and your leak proof lid is ready for on the go convenience. It even features a protective spout cover to keep out dirt and germs for cleaner drinking. For added peace of mind, engage the button lock to prevent the unintended pressing of the Autospout button. A clip on handle attaches your 24 ounce water bottle to your bag, backpack, or other gear for all day hands free carrying. Whether you’re Speeding down the expressway or getting in that last mile on the treadmill, your new water bottle fits most cup holders. At the end of the day, unscrew the top and throw lid and body onto the top rack of your dishwasher for a no fuss cleanup.
feature_bullets: BPA free water bottle features a pop up straw that operates with one hand
Protective spout cover keeps out dirt and germs for cleaner drinking
Lid is leak proof when closed for on the go convenience
Button lock prevents unintended pressing of the pop up straw button for added peace of mind
Clip on handle attaches to bags, key rings, and more for easy carrying
Top rack dishwasher safe lid and body for easy cleanup

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars8,505 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
